entities.description: Indicates if the respondent has received any treatment related to substance or drug use.
Indicates if the respondent participated in a support group for substance use.
Indicates if the respondent has been seen in the emergency room or department due to substance use.
Indicates if the respondent received substance use treatment as a hospital inpatient.
Indicates if the respondent received substance use treatment at a residential rehabilitation center.
Indicates if the respondent received mental health treatment at a residential mental health center.

relationships.description: Indicates if the respondent participated in a support group for substance use.
Indicates if the respondent has been seen in the emergency room or department due to substance use.
Indicates if the respondent received substance use treatment as a hospital inpatient.
Indicates if the respondent received substance use treatment at a residential rehabilitation center.
Indicates if the respondent received mental health treatment at a residential mental health center.
